Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm new to the forums been playing with KSP for 5 months or so.

before christmas i started recording my exploits, basically, i wanted to build a mobile station with lander, and take it out to a planet, drop the lander, run around fetch it back up and go home.

However, i've seen Scott Manlys space tourism videos and decided to start a new series when i put a station in orbit and a base on every planet and moon.

So, i wanted to ask people to take a look at my videos, suggest improvements (so of the first lot probably are boring since they were recorded and narrated while i was playing).

Please be aware, my channel is used for alot of other things none KSP too.

Also, i am running about 2 weeks behind on video's due to having to narrate in 3rd person and stitch video's together if it's a long mission.

http://www.youtube.com/user/comwarrior69

Thanks in advance
